articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Command of KPA Large Combined Unit and Unit under It
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Command of KPA Large Combined Unit and Unit under It 
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected the command of KPA large combined unit 313 and a unit under it standing guard over the eastern sector of the front.
					 He arrived at the unit stationed on the forefront by crossing Chol Pass, a symbol of the country's defense and Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He first inspected KPA unit 894 honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					
					 He looked round the monument to the field-guidance of leader Kim Jong Il at the unit, guided by its commanding officers. He then went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the history of the unit.
					
					 He was satisfied to hear the report that the unit was honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment, it produced 60 heroes of the Republic and labor heroes and 30 recipients of National Reunification Prize and 22 companies became hero companies amid profound trust and loving care of the party and the leader. 
					
					 Noting that this unit, associated with a lot of relics on Kim Jong Il's leadership, has a good tradition shining with many combat exploits, he urged the unit to register signal results in the great war for national reunification in the future to glorify his feats recorded in its history.
					
					 He looked round the office of commanding officers, military research room and other places visited by Kim Jong Il to learn about the unit's combat preparations and readiness to go into action.
					
					 Watching with keen attention its plans for operations and battles, he lucidly clarified the important issues to which the unit should direct efforts in combat preparations to cope with the enemies' attempt for a war of aggression and their methods of military actions.
					
					 He taught the unit in detail where it should focus attention in making preparations for battle as it plays an important role in performing the duty of the large combined unit for offensive operations and to which it should direct efforts in order to create combat circumstances favorable for its operation for coping with the tense situation where a war may break out any moment due to the enemies' on-going desperate moves.
					
					 He looked round the soldiers' hall, library and other facilities for ideological and cultural education to acquaint himself in detail with the political and ideological education of soldiers.
					
					 At the library he said soldiers should become men of knowledge while preparing themselves as stalwart fighters, adding that to this end they should read many books and acquire rich cultural attainments, writing about their impressions of what they read. 
					
					 It is a good method of mental training to read many books and while doing so they would nurture genuine love for the country, he added.
					
					 He took deep care of soldiers' living, looking round soldiers' bedrooms, mess hall and daily provision stores of a company directly under the unit.
					
					 He encouraged the soldiers of the unit safeguarding the defence line of the socialist country on the forefront from the enemies before having a photo taken with them.
					
					 Then he inspected the command of KPA large combined unit 313.
					
					 He had a photo session with its servicepersons.
					
					 He was briefed on the monument to the on-the-spot guidance provided by President Kim Il Sung before having a photo taken with lecturer Ri Hye Suk and commanding officers of the large combined unit.
					
					 He went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated for its history. He learned about the proud path covered by the unit; it was honored with immortal field guidance given by the President 38 times and by Kim Jong Il 33 times and it produced 118 heroes and many recipients of orders for military merits during the last Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 When he asked the commander of the unit how many heroes were produced by the unit in the post-war period, he was told that it produced 109 heroes. Hearing this, he said this figure is enough to know well about the exploits of the large combined unit.
					
					 He was pleased to see the display of the noble title granted to the unit by Kim Jong Il -- the eldest son of the KPA, a standard unit, a unit in which military and political affairs are combined well, a unit he knows well and a unit which does its job well without being known to others.
					
					 Watching the display of the days of field guidance provided by Kim Jong Il, he said Kim Jong Il clearly indicated a programme for a great war for national reunification and the KPA is sure to triumph if it fights as taught by him.
					
					 When the country was facing a stern trial, Kim Jong Il crossed Chol Pass 18 times to weather it together with the KPA. He crossed it day and night and even at dawn, Kim Jong Un noted, adding that thanks to his forced march the country could be defended and it came to demonstrate the might of Songun Korea with tremendous military capability. 
					
					 Recollecting Kim Jong Il who crossed Chol Pass so frequently, he said he considers the front guarded by the soldiers as the yard of his house and he would often visit them, urging them to glorify the so much effort exerted by Kim Jong Il by working hand in hand.
					
					 Expressing his hope that the unit would not forget the trust reposed in it by Kim Jong Il, calling it the unit of the eldest son, prepare itself as a combat unit of tigers of Mt Paektu and creditably perform its duty, he added that he would always remember Chol Pass and that the service personnel of the unit would be in his mind.
					
					 He learned in detail about the enemy movements in the eastern sector of the front and examined the operational plan of the unit.
					
					 Noting that the enemies are now staging war drills for aggression despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, he recalled that during his inspection of forefront units in the western sector of the front he issued an order to the whole army that if the enemies fire even a single shell on the inviolable territory of the DPRK, it should deal prompt deadly blows at them and go over to a counter-attack, adding that he examined the operational plan of the Supreme Command and finally signed it. 
					
					 When examining the operational plan of the unit, I found it has been worked out in such a way as to go into action immediately in line with the strategic intention of the Supreme Command, he noted.
					
					 He, while examining the operational plan, set right some shortcomings and took relevant measures.
					
					 Upon receiving the precious teachings from him, the commanding officers of the unit were filled with confidence and courage and earnestly asked him to issue the final order for charge.
					
					 On his way back after wrapping up his inspection, he visited the monument of a dedicated poem on Chol Pass.
					
					 All the service personnel of the unit made their pledge of loyalty to Kim Jong Un who was on an inspection tour of the front to defend the socialist country from early morning till the hour beyond lunch time that they would reliably stand guard over the eastern sector of the front and once he issues an order, they would bring the theatre of operations in the eastern sector in the south under their control at a breath.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Calls for Adhering to Principle of Equality
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Calls for Adhering to Principle of Equality 
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The principle of equality is the basic one to be strictly abided by in relations among countries.
					 A DPRK delegate said this when addressing the plenary meeting of the Geneva Disarmament Conference on August 21.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 Some countries are still trying to keep unequal relations by counting on the military superiority.
					
					 They are also enforcing the policy of nuclear blackmail in an undisguised manner, disregarding the requirements and obligations of international law. At the same time, they are putting spurs to the preparations for preempting nuclear attacks on other countries any moment.
					
					 Such acts are quite contrary to the requirements of the international community and pose grave threats to global peace and security.
					
					 Allowance of double standards will only make the international relations biased and complicated, much less contributing to the fair solution to international issues.
					
					 The policy of double standards existing in international relations and unequal relations caused by it have negative effects on the progress of the disarmament conference.
					
					 Some countries are finding a solution to the progress of the disarmament conference in changing the procedures and regulations of the conference and its work method the keynote of which is the principle of unanimous agreement. The DPRK does not agree with them.
					
					 The DPRK is convinced that confidence can be built and true political atmosphere for negotiations be created within the disarmament conference only when all countries thoroughly abide by the principle of cooperation, mutual benefits and non-interference in internal affairs of other countries.
					
					 As for the issue of forming a negotiation forum outside the conference, the view of the DPRK is that there can never be other forum except the present disarmament conference.
					
					 The disarmament conference is the only forum for multilateral negotiations whose mission is to work out internationally recognized disarmament pacts upon authorization of the first special meeting of the UN General Assembly on disarmament in 1978.
					
					 Availing himself of this opportunity, the delegate reaffirmed the DPRK's support for the proposal of non-aligned and other developing countries on the earlier convention of the fourth special meeting of the UN General Assembly on disarmament.

articles.title: Italian Businessman Goes Back Home
articles.content:
Italian Businessman Goes Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, flew back home on Monday after visiting the DPRK.

articles.title: Meeting Celebrating Youth Day Held with Splendor
articles.content:
Meeting Celebrating Youth Day Held with Splendor
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting celebrating Youth Day took place with splendor in Pyongyang on Monday to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					 Kim Jong Un has taken measures to celebrate the first Youth Day in the new century of Juche with splendor as a great event of the whole country.
					
					 Present there were Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyong Hui and other senior officials of the party, the state and the army, delegates to celebrations of Youth Day, officials of the youth league, officials concerned, youth and students in the city, a delegation of Korean youth and students in Japan and a delegation of the Confederation of Korean Youth in China.
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, to the participants in the celebrations and young people across the country from the way-off front was read out at the meeting.
					
					 Upon receiving the message sent by him, all participants broke into enthusiastic cheers of "hurrah!"
					
					 Officer Kim Hyon Hyok, who took the floor on behalf of the soldiers of the Korean People's Army, said that the message sent by Kim Jong Un serves as a banner of victory as it encourages young people to perform new feats in the defence of the country and the great drive to build a thriving nation.
					
					 The Supreme Commander has ushered in a new heyday in developing the revolutionary armed forces with his rare military wisdom, outstanding commanding arts, iron-willed pluck and noble love for comrades-in-arms, he noted, adding:
					
					 We soldiers will become a scout party in the great war for the country's reunification advancing, leveling rifles at one target as indicated by Kim Jong Un, and indomitable fighters and young heroes dashing ahead towards enemy positions, shouting "Long Live Marshal Kim Jong Un!" 
					
					 If the enemies fire even a single shell on the inviolable territorial waters and territory of the country, we will never miss the golden opportunity but reduce at one go all the places where they are entrenched to ashes with deadly retaliatory blows.
					
					 Labor Hero Ju Myong Gil, a worker of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex who spoke on behalf of the young workers, said that they would courageously advance toward a final victory in the drive to build a thriving nation, loudly sounding the grand march of the youth, in hearty response to the militant tasks set forth in the message.
					
					 All workers will keep themselves highly alerted, each tightly holding a rifle in one hand and a hammer in the other, and dynamically wage a charge for increased production, he declared, adding: If the enemies dare fire even a single shell at this land, we will form young workers units and turn out in all-people resistance. 
					
					 Ri Un Jong, a tractor driver of the Poman Co-op Farm of Sohung County who took the floor on behalf of young farmers, said that young people in agricultural field would successfully do farming with transparent loyalty and patriotic enthusiasm, fully armed with Kim Jong Il's patriotism and thus do their bits in increasing the nation's grain production.
					
					 When the moment to launch a decisive battle comes, we will wage a sacred war for crushing the enemies, standing alongside the fighters of the KPA in the same trenches for defending the country, and conduct a dynamic struggle for increased wartime grain production and send greater quantities of food to the front, she declared.
					
					 Kim Chung Il, student of Kim Il Sung University who spoke on behalf of students, said: All students will thoroughly arm themselves with the idea of the party true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un and study hard for the sake of the country and thus grow to be able builders of a thriving socialist nation and proud revolutionary talents.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors dare ignite a war against the inviolable land of the country, we will replace pens by arms and courageously rush to the front to mercilessly wipe out the enemies and certainly achieve the historic cause of the country's reunification, he stated.

articles.title: Youth Delegates Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
Youth Delegates Tour Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Delegates to the celebrations of the Youth Day visited various places here.
					 They went to Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, and the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Sunday.
					
					 Choe Yong Chol, a delegate from South Hwanghae Province, told KCNA:
					
					 "President Kim Il Sung's family members in Mangyongdae devoted themselves to liberating the country from the Japanese colonial rule, undergoing all sorts of hardships. 
					
					 We are carrying forward the tradition of the family, the tradition of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 We will fulfill the duty entrusted to us in the Songun (military-first) era, however difficult the road ahead of us is."
					
					 Ri Hak Chol, a delegate from Jagang Province, said:
					
					 "Now I am spending enjoyable days in Pyongyang.
					
					 I am overwhelmed with desire to live up to the trust of the Workers' Party of Korea in the young people.
					
					 I'll become a youth hero in the efforts to glorify Kim Jong Un's era."
					
					 A delegate, Han Ji Hyon (16), elder sister of Han Hyon Gyong, who saved portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il from a landslide at the cost of her life in June, said:
					
					 "Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent his autographic letter to my family, in praise of my sister's behavior.
					
					 With his trust kept deep in my mind, I'll follow suit of the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and devote myself to contributing to carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche."

articles.title: Youth Delegates Tour Various Parts of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Youth Delegates Tour Various Parts of Pyongyang 
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Delegates to the celebrations of Youth Day visited various places of Pyongyang.
					 They went to the Exhibition of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army. Being briefed on the fact that the exhibition was successfully built under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, they looked round small arms, various types of artillery pieces, tanks, armored cars, warships, aircraft, strategic rockets and other combat and technical equipment manufactured at munitions factories in the DPRK.
					
					 They visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower.
					
					 Lecturers of the Tower warmly welcomed them with bunches of flowers, 
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the main sculpture "Victory".
					
					 They also went to the Three-Revolution Exhibition.
					
					 At the Hall of Works on the Juche Idea they grasped ideological and theoretical feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They moved to the Hall of Heavy Industry and the National House of Class Education.

articles.title: Youth Delegates Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower
articles.content:
Youth Delegates Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Delegates of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean Youth  League in Japan, who are participating in the celebrations for the Youth Day (Aug. 28), visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Saturday. 
					 Being briefed on the memorial tower, they expressed admiration at the massive heroism displayed by the servicepersons and civilians during the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), true to the leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 A KPA soldier, Kim Kwang Myong, told KCNA:
					
					 "We cherish deep in our minds the spirit displayed by the heroic soldiers in defeating the U.S. invaders in the Fatherland Liberation War, faithful to the illustrious guidance of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 I will stand in the van in remaining loyal to the Songun (military-first) leadership of respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un."
					
					 Another soldier, Kim Hyok Jin, said:
					
					 "I was deeply impressed by the guide's explanation. The soldiers of the elder generation taught us how we should live for the country.
					
					 The KPA soldiers risked their lives in battles in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime have kicked off war exercises against the DPRK.
					
					 If they dare provoke us, we, soldiers on Mu Islet, will launch a powerful retaliatory strike at them and lead it to a sacred war for national reunification, as ordered by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un." 
					
					 Kim Song Jin, a delegate of the Korean Youth League in Japan, said:
					
					 "I am very proud of myself for attending the celebrations of the Youth Day, together with youth delegates in the homeland. I will work hard, carrying forward the fighting spirit displayed by the heroes of the elder generation."

articles.title: 12th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies Opens
articles.content:
12th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies Opens 
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The 12th national exhibition of inventions and new technologies opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Monday.
					 On display there are more than 1 100 products, models, diagrams, CDs, etc. showcasing inventions and new technological achievements appreciated at ministries and national institutions and in various provinces.
					
					 Among them are successes conducive to developing the economy and improving people's living standard by stepping up the work to put the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis, closely combining science and technology with production and raising the core basic technology and applied science and technology, etc. to a new higher stage.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Yong Rim, Choe Thae Bok and other officials.
					
					 Choe Sang Gon, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, made an inaugural speech.
					
					 The exhibition will involve scientific and technological forum, technical workshop, technological service for the production of cutting-edge products and exchange and service for intellectual products and various other activities for technological dissemination.

articles.title: Rason Economic, Trade Zone Attracts Foreign Businesses
articles.content:
Rason Economic, Trade Zone Attracts Foreign Businesses
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The 2nd Rason International Trade Fair was closed on Thursday.
					 The fair served as an occasion to invigorate economic and trade activities among countries and regions.
					
					 A wide range of trade consultations were held during the fair, covering joint venture and investment.
					
					 A forum on investment in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone took place on the sidelines of the fair.
					
					 Businessmen from China, Russia, the Czech Republic, Sweden and other countries expressed understandings of feasibility of investment in the zone, which is turning into a hub of international transit trade, processed goods export, tourism and financial service. 
					
					 A legal foundation was set to guarantee the development and infrastructure has mainly been provided in the zone.
					
					 The zone, which is of high economic and strategic significance, will turn to be a free economic zone conducive to developing the economy in various countries.

articles.title: DPRK Defeats Canada at U-20 Women's World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Defeats Canada at U-20 Women's World Cup
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK had the last group league match with Canada on Monday at the 2012 U-20 Women's World Cup.
					 The DPRK team trounced its Canadian rival 2:1 to go into the next stage with the top score in the group.

articles.title: 26th Pyongyang International Table Tennis Tournament Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
26th Pyongyang International Table Tennis Tournament Opens in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The 26th Pyongyang International Invitational Table Tennis Tournament opened with due ceremony at Table Tennis Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here on Aug. 27.
					 It brought together players from Norway, New Zealand, Denmark, China and the DPRK (Group A and B) and they will compete in men and women's team events and men and women's singles and doubles.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Pak Gyu Hong, chairman of the DPRK Table Tennis Association and director of the Rungnado Guidance Bureau, officials concerned and sportspersons.
					
					 Vice-Minister of Sports and Physical Culture Kim Jang San, chairman of the organizing committee of the tournament, made an opening address.
					
					 Then followed by the men and women's team events.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Defends Socialism with Arms
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Defends Socialism with Arms 
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il had devoted himself to defending socialism in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea with arms since he began the Songun (military-first) leadership on August 25, 1960.
					 The U.S.-led imperialists intensified moves to stifle the DPRK in coincidence with collapse of socialism in East European nations.
					
					 The U.S. provocative moves to unleash another war against the DPRK got a new momentum in Juche 87 (1998).
					
					 They launched a blockade of the DPRK in carrying out the operational plan "OPLAN 5027" aimed to make a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK. 
					
					 The danger of a new war between the DPRK and the United States reached an extreme phase and the peace of the Korean Peninsula, northeast Asia and the rest of the world was seriously threatened.
					
					 At that time, a statement of the spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army was released.
					
					 It is a tradition and reaction method peculiar to the KPA to return fire for fire. Preemptive attack is not a choice for the United States only, the statement said. The KPA will answer the U.S. provocation with merciless annihilating blow.
					
					 Thus, Kim Jong Il met all sorts of challenge of the imperialists with such tough military counteraction in the whole period of Songun leadership.
					
					 His Songun leadership foiled the imperialists' "nuclear racket" and moves to stifle socialism in the DPRK and defended the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was really a peerlessly illustrious commander, who defended the dignity of the country and nation and socialism by force of arms.

articles.title: Servicepersons Ready for Sacred War
articles.content:
Servicepersons Ready for Sacred War
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Tension on the Korean Peninsula has been on the rise, due to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime.
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, during his recent inspection tour of island defence detachments stationed in the biggest hotspot in the southernmost part of the southwest front, ordered the servicepersons to deal at once deadly counter-blows at the enemy if even a single shell is dropped on the waters or in the territory of the DPRK and lead the battle to a sacred war for national reunification.  
					
					 Inspired by his order, DPRK servicepersons are in high spirits to react to a possible provocation of the U.S. and the south Korean regime with a sacred war for national reunification. 
					
					 Ju Yong Min, an officer of the Air and Anti-air Forces of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 "Once a sacred war for national reunification is launched, we will strike the White House and Chongwadae as well.
					
					 The world will witness the miserable end of the disturbers of peace."
					
					 Sin Chol Hyok, an officer of the Strategic Rocket Force of the KPA, said:
					
					 "The military exercises indicate that the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea are wreckers of peace and security of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 A preemptive attack is by no means an exclusive choice of one side. 
					
					 It is a traditional mode and militant spirit peculiar to the KPA to return fire for fire and react to tough policy with tougher policy. 
					
					 We are ready to show our forces' might."
					
					 Yu Song Il, a 22-year-old student of Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 "Upon hearing the Supreme Commander's order given to the servicepersons, I petitioned to be allowed to join the army. 
					
					 We, students, have grown under the deep care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Military service is what we should undergo at this juncture. If the U.S. forces and the Lee's group dare ignite a war on this land, we will fight for national reunification."

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons in Full Combat Readiness
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons in Full Combat Readiness
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The men and officers of the Korean People's Army are taking a combat posture as remarked by Marshal Kim Jong Un, KPA supreme commander, in a banquet arranged in celebration of the anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun (military-first) revolutionary leadership (August 25). 
					 The U.S. and south Korean regime, disregarding the DPRK's warning, kicked off the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill to create a touch-and-go situation in the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un's inspection tours of frontline units encourage servicepersons when the security of the country and the people is jeopardized seriously.
					
					 His inspection tours of the southwest front and east front make service personnel harden their determination to mercilessly deal an annihilating blow to the provokers.
					
					 A KPA officer, Rim Kwang Il, told KCNA:
					
					  "The Supreme Commander issued an order that if the enemies drop even a single shell on our inviolable territory and territorial waters, the KPA should deal prompt deadly blows at them and the whole army should turn out as one and lead the battle to an all-out counter-offensive for accomplishing the great cause of national reunification. And he examined an operational plan for implementing it and finally signed it. 
					
					 The men and officers of our unit are now ready for action to cope with the reckless war provocation moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime.
					
					 One must draw the line somewhere.
					
					 We will never remain onlookers to their reckless moves of aggression.
					
					 I will devote myself to defending the headquarters of our revolution, the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for us advancing under the immortal banners bearing portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il."

articles.title: Servicepersons Sure of Victory in War for National Reunification
articles.content:
Servicepersons Sure of Victory in War for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, in a banquet arranged in celebration of the anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun (military-first) revolutionary leadership (August 25), said he signed an all-out counter-offensive plan for accomplishing the great cause of national reunification.
					 In this regard, Hyon Ki Chong, a general officer of the KPA, told KCNA:
					
					 "Some days ago, Supreme Commander of KPA Kim Jong Un, during his inspection tour of frontline units of the southwest front, ordered the servicepersons to deal at once deadly counter-blows at the enemy if even a single shell is dropped on the waters or in the territory of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and lead the battle to a sacred war for national reunification.
					
					 And a few days ago, he announced that he signed the operational plan for implementing it."
					
					 A KPA general officer, Tong Tae San, said;
					
					 "The ratification of the operational plan signals a great scared war for national reunification.
					
					 In response to the order of the supreme commander, the heroic Korean People's Army will counter a provocation of the enemies with a prompt counterattack and a war of aggression with a sacred war for national reunification. 
					
					 Victory is in store for the Korean people in a war for national reunification.
					
					 If the U.S. and Lee Myung Bak regime dare provoke a war, though the DPRK does not want it, we will finish the war at a stretch, in line with the operational plan the supreme commander signed.
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee group of traitors will pay dearly for their reckless moves."

articles.title: Corbicula Good for Protection of Liver
articles.content:
Corbicula Good for Protection of Liver
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- From olden times corbicula has been used as medicinal material in Korea.
					 Tonguibogam, an encyclopedia of traditional medicine of Korea, says corbicula is efficacious for weakness, enervation and indigestion.
					
					 In particular, it is good in dissolving poisonous substances in liver.
					
					 Corbicula spawns in summer.
					
					 Koreans gather Corbicula for food or medicinal material after its spawning days.
					
					 A health drink was developed with its medicinal ingredients as main substances.
					
					 Thak Un Ju, a researcher at Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA that corbicula includes taurine, glycogen, anticancer materials and essential amino acid.
					
					 She made liver-protection liquid with corbicular, which helps enhance immunity and improve health conditions.
					
					 Corbicular gives a good effect on bladder, stomach and eyesight.

articles.title: Typhoon-15 to Hit Korea
articles.content:
Typhoon-15 to Hit Korea
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Typhoon-15 is moving northwest at a velocity of 30 kilometers per hour.
					 With 960 hPa in the center, it has the maximum wind speed of 38 meters per second.
					
					 It has a radius of 300 kilometers with wind of over 25 meters per second and a radius of 650 kilometers with wind of over 15 meters per second.
					
					 The typhoon is expected to reach the sea off South Chungchong at around 15:00 Tuesday and the west coast of South Hwanghae Province at around 21:00 Tuesday before moving northeast.
					
					 Most areas of Korea will experience wind of 10 to 20 meters per second, over 25 meters per second to the maximum, from Tuesday mourning to next morning, accompanied by heavy rain.
					
					 Wind of 20 to 25 meters per second, over 30 meters per second to the maximum, will sweep the West and East Sea of Korea, generating 5 to 7-meter-high waves in the seas.
					
					 A tidal wave is forecast on the east coast of Korea and the coast of Hwanghae Province.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean War Exercises against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean War Exercises against DPRK Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, issued a statement on August 25 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea for their reckless war exercises against the DPRK.
					 The statement noted that south Korea has turned into the theater of a war owing to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills.
					
					 Officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan and other Korean youth and students in Japan bitterly condemn the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the south Korean warmongers, wreckers of peace and war maniacs, the statement said.
					
					 It was thanks to the homeland defending the dignity of overseas compatriots that Korean youth and students could have lived a full-fledged life as Koreans generation after generation in an alien land, it noted, and went on:.
					
					 The homeland is making victorious advance in another century of Juche, holding another great leader in high esteem. This gives them great courage and inspiration.
					
					 The Korean youth and students in Japan would smash warmongers' moves together with youth in homeland who are taking a combat posture with the will to deal deadly blows at the enemies in hearty response to the order given by Kim Jong Un and leave the U.S. imperialist aggressors and sycophantic traitors no place to live on earth.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Lee Group's Cooperation with Outside Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Lee Group's Cooperation with Outside Forces 
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is hit hard from all sides, after losing popularity due to sycophancy and treachery, confrontation with compatriots and unpopular rule. It is seeking a way out in cooperation with outside forces and relying on its masters to do harm to the DPRK. This is, however, a foolish dream.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a bylined article:
					
					 The Lee regime is a group of wicked warmongers who brought back the past of distrust and confrontation through cooperation with outside forces and pushed inter-Korean relations to a complete collapse, though they had favorably developed, and disturbed peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, bringing dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over it. 
					
					 Since the present conservative authorities came to power, no proper dialogue has been held between the north and the south and all cooperation undertakings have been suspended though they had made brisk headway in various fields. This is an inevitable product of the cooperation in the anti-DPRK nuclear and "human rights" campaigns and military cooperation pursued by the Lee group with outside forces.
					
					 The group has made desperate efforts to hurt the DPRK by force of arms in collusion with its master, zealously pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 As long as the U.S. imperialists and the Lee group of traitors are allowed to go mad with the moves to provoke a war against the DPRK, it is hard to expect any peace and peaceful reunification of Korea and the Korean nation is bound to meet a disaster. 
					
					 The root cause of misfortune should be removed in time. Now is the time to finally settle accounts with aggressors and traitors.
					
					 It is entirely a just measure for self-defence for defending the country and the nation, preserving peace and security on the peninsula and achieving the country's reunification to mercilessly wipe out the war maniacs with invincible military capability and powerful deterrent force for self-defence built up under the banner of Songun.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the puppet group of traitors dare ignite a war, it will not be confined to a local war and the DPRK will never miss the golden opportunity but lead it to a sacred war for national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Attempt to Spray Radioactive Materials in Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Attempt to Spray Radioactive Materials in Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- When driven to a tight corner during the last Korean War, the U.S. worked out a horrible plan to massively spray radioactive materials in the area dividing the Korean Peninsula in a bid to make it into no-man zone. It was reported that the U.S. conducted a total of 65 field tests in its nuclear test ground till 1952 after examining and confirming its feasibility. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. plan was a scenario for hair-raising man-killing unprecedented in the world history of war and unpardonable crimes against the DPRK.
					
					 Much water has flown under the bridge since the ceasefire of the Korean War, but the Korean people do not forget the monstrous atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. is kicking up a row in various parts of the world under the signboard of "anti-terrorism". With nothing can it cover up its sinister true colors as a nuclear criminal and chieftain of state-sponsored terrorism. 
					
					 The above-said U.S. attempt is not something that happened long ago because the recently disclosed document called on the U.S. not to completely abandon the use of nuclear materials on the peninsula and but keep open the possibility of furthering the discussion in the future, too. This suggests that the U.S. scheme to turn the peninsula into a wasteland with nuclear materials is in the present tense. 
					
					 The frantic Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime now under way in south Korea are large-scale, most dangerous and provocative drills for mounting a preemptive and comprehensive nuclear attack on the DPRK. The facts go to prove that if the U.S. imperialists find themselves in the danger of facing deadly blows of the DPRK after igniting another Korean war, they may put the plan into practice. 
					
					 If the enemies dare commit provocations against the DPRK, it will give full play to the might of Songun built up for years and force the nuclear criminals to pay a thousand-fold price.

articles.title: Korean Women in Japan Brand UFG as War Rehearsal
articles.content:
Korean Women in Japan Brand UFG as War Rehearsal 
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Kang Chu Ryon, chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, in a statement on August 25 branded mad-cap Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) joint military exercises now under way in south Korea as DPRK-targeted war drill.
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers are set to ignite the second Korean war with the involvement of huge troops and the latest war means as well as military personnel of several countries while calling the drill an "annual exercise for defense", the statement said, adding that this is absolutely intolerable.
					
					 The officials of the union and other Korean women vehemently denounce with towering indignation the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime for creating the touch-and-go situation on the homeland again, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 For the past 59 years since the signing of the Korean Armistice Agreement, the U.S. and south Korea regularly staged aggression war exercises and committed hideous state-sponsored, politically-motivated terrorism, challenging the desire of all the Korean people for peace on the Korean Peninsula and reconciliation, unity and reunification of the nation.
					
					 The officials of the union and other Korean women would wage unflinching struggle to reject the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers' aggression moves and usher in the new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities Reported by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities Reported by Foreign Media 
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign media reported on Sunday that Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un who is inspecting the eastern sector of the front, enjoyed together with service personnel a field performance given by the Moranbong Band to celebrate the August 25, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The Chinese News Service said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un enjoyed together with KPA service personnel a field performance given by the Moranbong Band to celebrate the August 25.
					
					 Appreciating the performance were senior party and army officials, commanding officers of the ground, naval, air and anti-air and strategic rocket forces of the KPA, commanders of the combined units in the eastern sector of the front, airmen and soldiers of the Kamnamu Company (a company under persimmon trees).
					
					 The performers made an impressive artistic representation of the fact that there are the tradition and heritage of carrying forward the Songun revolutionary cause thanks to the feats leader Kim Jong Il performed by protecting the destiny of the nation and glorifying the DPRK as a powerful nation with Songun.
					
					 The Supreme Commander recognized familiar soldiers of the company and showed his thumb in appreciation of their singing. He extended warm congratulations to the dynamic and optimistic soldiers.
					
					 ITAR-TASS and Kyodo News conveyed the same news.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Aug. 25 Speech Reported by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Aug. 25 Speech Reported by Foreign Media 
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign media Sunday reported the speech made by Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un at the banquet given in celebration of August 25, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Xinhua News Agency said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, addressing the banquet given in celebration of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership, noted that the U.S. and south Korea are staging large-scale war drills for aggression targeted against the DPRK even with forces of their allies involved, posing a grave threat to its security.
					
					 He said that if the enemies fire even a single shell on the inviolable territory and territorial waters of the DPRK, the KPA should deal prompt deadly blows at them and the whole army should turn out as one and lead the battle to an all-out counter-offensive for accomplishing the great cause of national reunification, adding that he issued this order to the whole army and examined the operational plan for implementing it and finally signed it. 
					
					 The Chinese News Service said:
					
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un in his speech made at the banquet given in celebration of Aug. 25 noted that Kim Jong Il provided the great unity between the army and people of the country with his patriotic will.
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK will never remain an onlooker to the enemies' moves and if another war breaks out, the U.S. and south Korea will meet a shameful doom in the war and the Korean nation will greet national reunification.
					
					 ITAR-TASS quoted Kim Jong Un as saying in his speech at the banquet given in celebration of Aug. 25:
					
					 "Counter a provocation with a prompt counterattack and a war of aggression with a great, just war for national reunification!" This is the principled stand and steadfast will of the DPRK.
					
					 "We will not remain an onlooker to the enemies' frantic moves for aggression but make every possible effort to protect the destiny of the country and the nation." 
					
					 Kyodo and Jiji news services also reported the speech.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" was carried by different countries.
					 The work, issued on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism, his noble life devoted to the country and people and key issues for embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The work was carried by the Russian Internet newspapers Hanber Journal and B Contaktse and posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the Association for the Promotion of Relations between Austria and DPRK on their Internet websites between Aug. 7 and 20.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Lauded by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Lauded by British Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Aug. 18 issued a joint statement on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guard Tank Division of the Korean People's Army where Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership was the unit that won fame in the combat for liberating Seoul in the past Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il's visit to that unit was the reflection of his will to embody the great Songun idea of giving definite priority to military affairs.
					
					 He strengthened the KPA not only politically and ideologically but in terms of military technique.
					
					 Under his Songun revolutionary leadership the Korean people and army have firmly safeguarded the gains of revolution and foiled every military provocation of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime.
					
					 Today his Songun revolutionary leadership is being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 This year he visited Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guard Tank Division, declaring to the world the Songun revolutionary leadership's continuation.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the Korean people will frustrate all kinds of provocations and terrorism of the U.S. imperialist and the south Korean puppet forces and reliably safeguard the socialist country of Juche.

articles.title: Beninese, Bangladeshi Political Figures Praise Songun
articles.content:
Beninese, Bangladeshi Political Figures Praise Songun
						
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Benin and Bangladeshi political figures issued statements on Aug. 16 and 17 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said since Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership on Aug. 25, 1960, a new heyday of prosperity has been unfolded in the DPRK.
					
					 Under his grandiose plan and energetic leadership the DPRK emerged as a country manufacturing and launching satellites and a nuclear weapons state and greeted the new era of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Saying the DPRK is now led by another outstanding Songun brilliant commander, he stressed the DPRK will steadily advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un. The victory of the world socialist cause is definite, he added.
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, said Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership was a special event which ushered in the bright future of shining victory for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 Under Kim Jong Un's leadership the DPRK is now displaying its dignity and might as a political and ideological power which any big enemy can not dare attack, he said, expressing his hope that the DPRK people and army will achieve great success in the drive for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country.

articles.title: Delegado coreano rechaza pauta de doble rasero
articles.content:
Delegado coreano rechaza pauta de doble rasero
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- En la reciente sesion plenaria de la Conferencia de Ginebra sobre el Desarme sostenida el dia 21 el delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronuncio un discurso.
					El subrayo que el principio de igualdad deviene el principio fundamental a ser respetado en las relaciones reciprocas entre los paises.
					
					Ahora algunos paises intentan seguir manteniendo las relaciones desiguales a base de sus superiores poderios militares, senalo y prosiguio:
					
					Por otra parte, ellos aplican abiertamente la politica de chantaje nuclear despreciando la demanda y el deber de la ley internacional y aceleran activamente los preparativos para realizar en cualquier momento el ataque nuclear preventivo contra otros paises.
					
					Tales actos se contravienen a la demanda de la comunidad internacional y destruyen gravemente la paz y seguridad mundial.
					
					Si se permite la pauta de doble rasero, se crean desigualdades y complicidades en las relaciones internacionales y los problemas internacionales no se resuelven con imparcialidad.
					
					La politica basada en la norma de doble rasero existente en las relaciones internacionales y las relaciones desiguales por esta causa dan afectos negativos al avance de la conferencia sobre el desarme.
					
					En la actualidad, algunos paises pretenden resolver el problema de la conferencia en el cambio del reglamento de proceso y metodo de trabajo de la conferencia en cuestion a base de principio de acuerdo unanime.
					
					La RPDC no esta de acuerdo con tales insistencias y esta convencida de que cuando se cumpla estrictamente el principio de cooperacion, beneficio mutuo y no intervencion en los asuntos internos entre todos los paises, se creara la confianza en la conferencia y se preparara el verdadero ambiente politico para negocios.
					
					Creemos que no es necesaria la existencia de cualquier tribuna, exclusive la actual conferencia, en cuanto al tema de instituir otra plataforma de negocios fuera de la conferencia sobre el desarme.
					
					La Conferencia sobre el Desarme resulta la unica tribuna de negocios multilaterales que adopta los tratados sobre el desarme, reconocida por la sociedad internacional y organizada por el encargo de la primera conferencia especial de la asamblea general de la ONU sobre el desarme sostenida en 1978.
					
					Aprovechamos esta oportunidad para reafirmar nuestro apoyo a la propuesta de los paises no alineados y los en vias de desarrollo sobre la convocacion pronta de la cuarta conferencia especial de la asamblea general de la ONU sobre el desarme.

articles.title: Tiene lugar en Pyongyang el acto por el Dia de la Juventud (texto integro)
articles.content:
Tiene lugar en Pyongyang el acto por el Dia de la Juventud (texto integro)
						
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar con solemnidad el dia 27 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto por el Dia de la Juventud para llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un tomo la iniciativa de celebrar el primer Dia de la Juventud de la nueva centuria del Juche como gran fiesta de todo el pais.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyong Hui y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los delegados a los festejos del Dia de la Juventud, los funcionarios de la union de la juventud socialista Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios interesantes, los jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos, la delegacion de jovenes y estudiantes coreanos residentes en Japon y la delegacion de la Asociacion de Jovenes Coreanos Residentes en China.
					
					Fueron invitados los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales.
					
					Primeramente se dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion enviado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC enviado a los participantes en el acto por el Dia de la Juventud y otros jovenes de todo el pais estando en el frente.
					
					Al escuchar el citado mensaje enviado por el Mariscal, los participantes lo aclamaron con estruendosas "Vivas" y efusivos aplausos.
					
					En representacion de los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, intervino el suboficial Kim Hyon Hyok quien senalo que el mensaje de felicitacion del Mariscal deviene la bandera de victoria que estimula a los jovenes, levantados gigantescamente en la defensa de la patria y la construccion de Estado prospero, a la creacion de nuevas proezas y continuo:
					
					El Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un allano la nueva epoca de desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias con su extraordinaria perspicacia militar, destacado arte de mando militar, caracter de acero y noble companerismo.
					
					Todos los soldados integraran la avanzada en la gran guerra por la reunificacion de la patria, que marchara adelante apuntando los fusiles unicamente a la direccion senalada por el Comandante Supremo, y seran los combatientes indoblegables y jovenes heroes que se lanzaran contra la posicion enemiga gritando "!Viva el Mariscal Kim Jong Un!"
					
					Si los enemigos lanzan una sola bala a las aguas y zonas jurisdiccionales de la patria, no perderan esa oportunidad de oro y reduciran de un aliento a cenizas todos los nidos de los enemigos con el fuego de represalia.
					
					En representacion de jovenes trabajadores, el Heroe del Trabajo Ju Myong Gil, obrero del Complenjo de Abono de Hungnam, destaco que las vanguardistas juveniles avanzaran con pasos firmes tocando fuertemente la trompeta y tambor de la gran marcha de la juventud hacia la victoria final de la construccion de Estado prospero, orientandose segun las tareas combativas presentadas en el mensaje, y prosiguio:
					
					Desplegaremos una ofensiva en la produccion manteniendonos en el maximo estado de movilizacion al tomar los fusiles en una mano y los martillos en la otra y nos movilizaremos en la guerra pannacional integrando las tropas de jovenes trabajadores si los enemigos se atreven a lanzar una sola bala a nuestro territorio.
					
					La conductora de tractor de la Granja Cooperativa de Pom-an del distrito de Sohung, Ri Un Jong, representante de agricultores jovenes, puntualizo que los vanguardistas juveniles de la rama agricola  desempenaran un papel importante en llenar el granero del pais trabajando con el patriotismo de         Kim Jong Il.
					
					Acoto que desplegaran la sagrada guerra de exterminio a los enemigos en la misma trinchera de los soldados del EPC para defender la patria si llega el tiempo de combate de vida o muerte y enviaran muchas provisiones al frente mediante el aumento de produccion de cereales en el tiempo de guerra.
					
					El estudiante de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Kim Chung Il, hablo en representacion del estudiantado destacando la necesidad de armarse cabalmente con la idea del partido en acato al gran proposito del Mariscal y aprender con mucho afan por la patria para prepararse como constructores y personal revolucionario encargado de construir un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Recalco que los estudiantes acudiran al frente y exterminaran despiadadamente a los enemigos tomando el fusil en sustitucion a la pluma si el imperialismo yanqui y la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak se atreven a abrir el primer fuego en el territorio patrio y cumpliran sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Inaugurada XII exhibicion de invenciones y nuevas tecnicas
articles.content:
Inaugurada XII exhibicion de invenciones y nuevas tecnicas
						
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revolucione la XII Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnicas.
					En las galerias estaban expuestos mas de mil 100 datos de invenciones y nuevas tecnicas en forma de objetos reales, maquetas, dibujos, CD, etc. valorados altamente en los ministerios, organos centrales y provincias.
					
					Fueron presentados los datos de exitos que contribuiran al desarrollo de la economia nacional y la mejora de la vida del pueblo al acelerar la jucheanizacion, modernizacion y cientifizacion de la economia nacional, combinar las ciencias y tecnicas con la produccion y poner en una nueva etapa alta la tecnologia basica medular y las ciencias y tecnicas  aplicadas.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 27 la ceremonia de inauguracion con la participacion de Choe Yong Rim, Choe Thae Bok y otros cuadros.
					
					La palabra inaugural estuvo a cargo de Choe Sang Gon, presidente del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnicas.
					
					En el periodo de exhibicion se realizaran varias labores de divulgacion como la reunion de presentacion de ciencias y tecnicas, el curso de tecnologia, el servicio de tecnicas de productos sofisticados, el servicio de intercambio de productos intelectuales.

articles.title: Inaugurado Torneo Internacional de Tenis de Mesa por Invitacion
articles.content:
Inaugurado Torneo Internacional de Tenis de Mesa por Invitacion
						
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 27 en el Centro de Tenis de Mesa del capitalino Reparto Chongchun el XXVI Torneo Internacional de Tenis de Mesa por Invitacion de Pyongyang con la participacion de los jugadores de Noruega, Nueva Zelanda, Dinamarca, China, y Corea (equipos A y B). 
					La competencia, que se extendera hasta el dia 31, tendra los partidos colectivos e individuales de ambos sexos y los dobles de ambos sexos. 
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural estuvieron presentes el titular de la Direccion Rungnado, Pak Kyu Hong, quien es presidente de la Asociacion de Ping-Pong de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y otros funcionarios de ramas concernientes, junto con los deportistas. 
					
					El viceministro de Deportes, Kim Jang San, presidente del comite organizador del torneo, pronunciodiscurso inaugural.
					
					Seguidamente, se realizaron los juegos colectivos de ambos sexos.
